page.title: 14Housing in Newport & Edgmond
page.content: Most of the{old streets}in Newport are named after important people or families.The{newer roads}are normally named after the land they are built on.Some{estates}are named after trees or flowers,others are named after royalty.Quite a lot of houses have {gas}for heating.Most of the houses are semi-detatched and{10}to{20 years old. Lots of people in Newport would choose to have gas central heating in their homes. Also people like to have their rooms separate like toilets and bathroom and lounge and dining room. Most people have an open-plan front garden and a gable roof.The oldest houses in Edgmond are anything up to{400 years}old.The newest housing seems to be from {35 years}old.Some of the cottages are made of stone and others of brick.
